Key: Whew... Talk about a packed day.

(I let out a sigh as I rolled into my bed,
letting the exhaustion get the better of me.)

(Maria... She's starting to express a whole
range of emotions.)

(At times, she's impressed. Other times, she pouts
like a child.)

(I've also caught her laughing modestly,
or telling jokes.)

(She seems to grow day by day. Showing
more and more faces. She's a mysterious girl.)

(Even so, I'm sure I can rest easy now. I'm
gonna fall asleep...)
(I look forward to whatever tomorrow holds.)
(Hmm? What is that noise?)
(The window...? Is someone outside?)

(Make no mistake. Someone's throwing
pebbles or something at my window.)
(Who on earth is it?)

(When I opened the window, Maria was there...
Wait, that can't be right.)

(She looked up at me, and beckoned towards
me with a daring smile. It's the girl who
resembles Maria... The black-clothed Arusu.)
Why are you here? It's so late.

(The black-clothed Arusu remained silent,
continuing to beckon me.)
I understand. I'll come down there.

(I spun around and left my bedroom. I made
sure to sneak out carefully so as to not alert
the others.)
...What do you want from me?

Ahahaha. The night sky is beautiful. So nice.
Perfect for an evening date.

What are you suggesting? We'll catch a cold
being out this late, you know?

I couldn't possibly catch a cold. It's my world,
after all.
I mean... You have a point.
Hey, Shido Itsuka?
What is it, black outfit?
Don't you think it's rude to call me that?
Fine then. What is it, Arusu?
You'd better teach me what love is.

What are you saying? Of course. Didn't I make
a promise?
I see... You're right.
What's wrong?
Ah, no. It's nothing.
Then, I'll be on my way. See you.
Ah, hey!
(After saying her piece, Arusu ran off.)
Wait! Who exactly are you?!

(Forgetting how late it was, I raised my voice
and chased after her.)
Ah ha ha, I'm me. I'm Arusu.
(Her mischievous laughter echoed in the darkness.)

(Eventually, I lost sight of her when she turned
the corner.)

(In pursuit, I turned the same corner. In front
of me, I saw another intersection.)
Which way did she go?

(Looking in each direction, I blindly ran towards
the right.)
(However...)
I lost her... She's surprisingly speedy.

(Laid out before me was an endless sprawl
of asphalt, lit under dim streetlights,
stretching into the darkness.)
(It's no use... I'll head home.)
...Huh?

(When I made it back to my house, I saw Maria
looking up at the night sky. Why'd she come out
all of a sudden?)
Maria... Weren't you asleep?
I felt like I had been called.
Called? By what?
I do not know. It may have been a mistake.

I see. Then, let's head back inside. It'd be no
good if you caught a cold.

(Wait. She can't catch a cold, right? Or does
that only apply to the one in black?)
Yes. The hour is late, so let us retire.

Good idea. You're right. I'm tired. Don't
sneak into my bed tomorrow, okay?
I cannot agree to that.
Are you serious...?

I have already discovered that sleeping with
you, Shido, is a source of great comfort.
What am I, a dakimakura...?
(Please, give me a break...)

(Letting out a sigh, I follow Maria into the
house and up the stairs.)

(But if tomorrow is like today... I'm either
going to be terrified, or I'll have a terrible
day. No, I need to make the most of what comes.)
